arn.description: The ARN of the Glue User Defined Function.

catalogId.description: ID of the Glue Catalog to create the function in. If omitted, this defaults to the AWS Account ID.

className.description: The Java class that contains the function code.

createTime.description: The time at which the function was created.

databaseName.description: The name of the Database to create the Function.

ownerType.description: The owner type. can be one of `USER`, `ROLE`, and `GROUP`.

resourceUris.description: The configuration block for Resource URIs. See resource uris below for more details.

databaseName.description: The name of the Database to create the Function.

ownerType.description: The owner type. can be one of `USER`, `ROLE`, and `GROUP`.

resourceUris.description: The configuration block for Resource URIs. See resource uris below for more details.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering UserDefinedFunction resources.
